metadata.title: RHSA-2022:5062: .NET Core 3.1 on RHEL 7 security and bugfix update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
.NET is a managed-software framework. It implements a subset of the .NET framework APIs and several new APIs, and it includes a CLR implementation.

New versions of .NET that address a security vulnerability are now available. The updated versions are .NET SDK 3.1.420 and .NET Runtime 3.1.26.

Security Fix(es):

* dotnet: NuGet Credential leak due to loss of control of third party symbol server domain (CVE-2022-30184)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2022-30184 dotnet: NuGet Credential leak due to loss of control of third party symbol server domain

platform: .NET Core on Red Hat Enterprise Linux
